abstract: Zimbabwean minister Walter Chidhakwa announces all mining in diamond-rich Marange area will be managed by government-owned Zimbabwe Consolidated Mining Company;  orders halt to all private operations, citing failure to renew expired licenses.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Zimbabwe: Government Seizes Mining Operations

snippet: All diamond mining will now be managed by the Zimbabwe Consolidated Mining Company, wholly owned by the government.
lead_paragraph: All diamond mining will now be managed by the Zimbabwe Consolidated Mining Company, wholly owned by the government.
